name: Genetics System Overhaul
goal: Implement comprehensive neuroevolution improvements to enable effective neural architecture search (NAS)
end_state: All GA parameters configurable via UI, API-first architecture ready for headless NAS with GPU acceleration

phases.name: Output Bias Parameter
phases.description: Replace dead zone with configurable output bias in neural settings
tasks: Add outputBias to SimulationConfig (range -2 to 0, default -0.5)
Replace dead zone slider with output bias slider in neural panel
Update NeuralNetwork.initialize() to use config.outputBias instead of hardcoded -1.5
Update tooltip to explain output bias effect on muscle activation
Remove dead zone code path from BatchSimulator
phases.test_focus: Creatures should be more active with bias closer to 0

phases.name: Mutation Decay Improvements
phases.description: Add configurable decay start, end, and duration parameters
tasks: Add to SimulationConfig: mutationDecayStart (default 0.5), mutationDecayEnd (default 0.1), mutationDecayGenerations (default 100)
Update calculateDecayedRate() to use these parameters
Add UI controls in neural panel for all three parameters
Update Neural Config display box to show current effective rate
phases.test_focus: Verify mutation rate changes correctly over generations

phases.name: Selection Methods
phases.description: Add tournament selection as alternative to truncation
tasks: Add selectionMethod: 'truncation' | 'tournament' to SimulationConfig
Add tournamentSize parameter (default 3)
Implement tournamentSelection() in Selection.ts
Update Population.evolve() to use selected method
Add UI dropdown for selection method
phases.test_focus: Tournament should maintain more diversity than truncation

phases.name: Adaptive Mutation
tasks: Add useAdaptiveMutation: boolean to SimulationConfig
Add stagnationThreshold (default 10 generations)
Add adaptiveMutationBoost (default 2x)
Track best fitness history in Population
Implement stagnation detection and rate boost logic
Add UI toggle and parameter controls
phases.test_focus: Mutation rate should increase after N generations without improvement

phases.name: Crossover Improvements
phases.description: Add SBX crossover option for neural weights
tasks: Add neuralCrossoverMethod: 'interpolation' | 'uniform' | 'sbx' to SimulationConfig
Implement SBX crossover (Simulated Binary Crossover) with eta parameter
Add eta parameter slider (default 2.0, range 0.5-5.0)
Add UI dropdown for crossover method
phases.test_focus: SBX should produce offspring 'between' parents more smoothly

phases.name: Fitness Sharing
phases.description: Implement fitness sharing for diversity maintenance
tasks: Add useFitnessSharing: boolean to SimulationConfig
Add sharingRadius parameter (default 0.5)
Implement genomeDistance() for neural genomes
Implement applyFitnessSharing() function
Integrate into selection process
Add UI toggle and radius slider
phases.test_focus: Population should maintain more phenotypic diversity

phases.name: Time Bonus
phases.description: Add time bonus for faster pellet collection
tasks: Add fitnessTimeBonus parameter (default 20)
Add fitnessTimeBonusScale (seconds for full bonus, default 5)
Calculate time bonus: bonus * (1 - timeToCollect/scale)
Update fitness calculation in BatchSimulator
Add UI controls

phases.name: Proprioception Inputs
phases.description: Add muscle strain as neural network input
tasks: Add useProprioception: boolean to SimulationConfig
Calculate muscle strain inputs during simulation
Update gatherSensorInputs to include strain when enabled
Update NEURAL_INPUT_SIZE dynamically based on muscle count
Handle topology adaptation when proprioception toggled
Add UI toggle
phases.test_focus: With proprioception, creatures should develop smoother gaits

phases.name: Efficiency Penalty Ramp
phases.description: Make efficiency penalty ramp up over generations
tasks: Add efficiencyPenaltyStartGen (default 50)
Add efficiencyPenaltyRampGens (default 50)
Calculate effective penalty based on generation
Update fitness calculation
Add UI controls for start gen and ramp duration
phases.test_focus: Early generations should explore freely, later generations penalized for inefficiency

phases.name: Speciation (Basic)
phases.description: Implement basic speciation for diversity protection
tasks: Define Species interface
Add useSpeciation: boolean to SimulationConfig
Add compatibilityThreshold parameter
Implement species assignment based on genome distance
Implement within-species selection
Add species stagnation tracking and culling
Visualize species count in stats panel
phases.test_focus: Multiple species should coexist with different strategies

phases.name: NEAT Foundation
phases.description: Implement NEAT gene representation and structural mutations
tasks: Define ConnectionGene and NodeGene interfaces
Implement global innovation counter
Implement NEATGenome creation with minimal topology
Implement NEATNetwork.fromGenome() with topological sort
Implement mutateAddConnection()
Implement mutateAddNode()
Add NEAT crossover by gene alignment
phases.test_focus: NEAT networks should grow topology over generations

phases.name: UI Panel Expansion
phases.description: Expand neural settings panel to accommodate new parameters
tasks: Reorganize neural panel into collapsible sections
Section 1: Network (mode, hidden size, activation, output bias)
Section 2: Mutation (rate decay start/end/gens, adaptive toggle)
Section 3: Selection (method, tournament size, fitness sharing)
Section 4: Advanced (proprioception, efficiency ramp, speciation)
Make panel scrollable or use tabs

phases.name: API-First Architecture
phases.description: Prepare for headless NAS by exposing all parameters via API
tasks: Define SimulationRequest and SimulationResult API types
Create runSimulation() function that takes full config
Return structured results (fitness, generations, best genome)
Enable batch execution for parameter sweeps
Add progress callbacks for long runs
phases.test_focus: Headless runs should complete and return results

phases.name: GPU Acceleration Research
tasks: Research WebGPU for neural network forward pass
Benchmark current CPU performance (creatures/second)
Prototype GPU-accelerated batch evaluation
Determine if physics (Cannon-ES) is the bottleneck vs NN
phases.notes: Physics is likely CPU-bound; GPU helps most with parallel NN evaluation for many creatures

references.fitness_sharing: Goldberg & Richardson (1987) - Genetic Algorithms with Sharing

guidelines: One phase at a time - test before moving on
Add tests for new genetics functions
Keep UI changes minimal until Phase 12
Maintain backward compatibility with existing saved runs
